#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,i,j,n,m;
	char a[15],b[15];
   // string a,b;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{   
		cin>>a;
		j=0;
		for(i=strlen(a)-1;i>=0;i--)
		b[j++]=a[i];
		b[j]='\0';
	//	cout<<a<<" "<<b<<"\n";
		if(!strcmp(a,b))
		cout<<"YES"<<"\n";
		else
		cout<<"NO"<<"\n";
		
	}
}
